__TOC__


content of <code>/etc/chatscripts/BluetoothDialup</code> :
<pre>
TIMEOUT 35
ECHO    ON
ABORT   '\nBUSY\r'
ABORT   '\nERROR\r'
ABORT   '\nNO ANSWER\r'
ABORT   '\nNO CARRIER\r'
ABORT   '\nNO DIALTONE\r'
ABORT   '\nRINGING\r\n\r\nRINGING\r'
''      \rAT
OK      'AT+CGDCONT=2,"IP","internet"'
OK      ATD*99#
CONNECT ""
</pre>

content of <code>/etc/ppp/peers/BluetoothDialup</code> :
<pre>
noauth
connect "/usr/sbin/chat -v -f /etc/chatscripts/BluetoothDialup"
usepeerdns
/dev/rfcomm0 115200
defaultroute
crtscts
lcp-echo-interval 30
noipdefault
debug
</pre>

No username/pass required. Tested on LG KU990. you may try to uncomment <code>#lcp-echo-failure 0</code> if you wish. <code>lcp-echo-interval 30</code> is set in order to keep alive the session - AFAIK Play automatically disconnects session idle for 180 secs.
